sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_page"><sys_ui_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>general</category><client_script/><description/><direct>false</direct><endpoint>x_jarodm_libra_libra_toggle_leftbar.do</endpoint><html><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">


	<g2:evaluate>
		var lt = new LTooling();

		var currPref = lt.getPreference('left_bar_minimize');

		var setToEnabled = false;

		if(currPref){

			lt.setPreference('left_bar_minimize',false);
			setToEnabled = false;
			gs.addInfoMessage(' Left-bar minimize configuration has been: Disabled ');


		}else{

			lt.setPreference('left_bar_minimize',true);
			setToEnabled = true;
			gs.addInfoMessage(' Left-bar minimize configuration has been: Enabled ');

		}


		var executeCacheUpdate = new global.LibraGlobal().flushMenuCache();

		var redirectToPage = new global.LibraGlobal().getSessionLastPage();

	</g2:evaluate>

	<META http-equiv="refresh" content="0;URL=$[redirectToPage]"/>

</j:jelly>

]]></html><name>libra_toggle_leftbar</name><processing_script/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>j4rodm</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-15 20:27:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>d89ff00edb67481019ced9595e9619bd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>libra_toggle_leftbar</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Libra Toolkit" source="x_jarodm_libra">823c7a15db27c41019ced9595e9619c0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Libra Toolkit">823c7a15db27c41019ced9595e9619c0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_page_d89ff00edb67481019ced9595e9619bd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>j4rodm</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-18 22:55:37</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_page></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_baa1af15dba7c41019ced9595e9619c6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_jarodm_libra_instance_customization</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_jarodm_libra_instance_customization">ageVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="age" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Calculate visible age</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {


	var displayDuration = '';

	if (current.age){

		var age = new GlideDateTime(current.age);

		var start = new GlideDateTime();
		start.setNumericValue(0);

		var duration = GlideDateTime.subtract(start, age).getDayPart();
		var durationYears = Math.floor(duration/365);
		var durationMonths = Math.floor((duration % 365)/30);
		var durationDays = Math.floor((duration % 365)%30);
		displayDuration = durationDays + ' Days';
		if (durationMonths > 0){
			if (durationMonths == 1){
				displayDuration = durationMonths + ' Month, '+ displayDuration;
			}else{
				displayDuration = durationMonths + ' Months, '+ displayDuration;
			}


		}

		if (durationYears > 0){
			if (durationYears == 1){
				displayDuration = durationYears + ' Year, '+ displayDuration;
			}else{
				displayDuration = durationYears + ' Years, '+ displayDuration;
			}


		}

	}

	current.age_read = displayDuration;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>j4rodm</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-14 00:17:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>baa1af15dba7c41019ced9595e9619c6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate visible age</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Libra Toolkit" source="x_jarodm_libra">823c7a15db27c41019ced9595e9619c0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Libra Toolkit">823c7a15db27c41019ced9595e9619c0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_baa1af15dba7c41019ced9595e9619c6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>j4rodm</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-14 00:17:30</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=baa1af15dba7c41019ced9595e9619c6"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_page"><sys_ui_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>general</category><client_script/><description/><direct>false</direct><endpoint>x_jarodm_libra_libra_configure_leftbar_min.do</endpoint><html><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g2:evaluate>

		gs.addInfoMessage('Left-bar items in the right column will be hidden from view when enabled.');
		var lt = new LTooling();

		var minimizeConfigURL = lt.getMinimizeConfigUrl();

		var currPref = lt.getPreference('left_bar_minimize');
		if(currPref){

			gs.addInfoMessage('Your left-bar minimize configuration is : Enabled ');

		}else{

			gs.addInfoMessage('Your left-bar minimize configuration is:  Disabled ');

		}


	</g2:evaluate>
	<META http-equiv="refresh" content="0;URL=$[minimizeConfigURL]"/>
</j:jelly>
]]></html><name>libra_configure_leftbar_min</name><processing_script/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>j4rodm</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-15 20:15:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>ee5d30cadb67481019ced9595e9619c6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>libra_configure_leftbar_min</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Libra Toolkit" source="x_jarodm_libra">823c7a15db27c41019ced9595e9619c0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Libra Toolkit">823c7a15db27c41019ced9595e9619c0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_page_ee5d30cadb67481019ced9595e9619c6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>j4rodm</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-18 22:54:32</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_page></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_90ac3255db27c41019ced9595e961989
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_jarodm_libra.LTooling</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>LTooling</name><script><![CDATA[var LTooling = Class.create();
LTooling.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {


		//global.LToolingGlobal



	},

	getMinimizeConfigUrl: function(userID){

		if (!userID){

			userID = gs.getUserID();
		}
		//sys_m2m_template.do?sys_is_list=true&sys_is_related_list=true&sys_target=x_jarodm_libra_application_minimize&sysparm_checked_items=&sysparm_collection=sys_user&sysparm_collectionID=95bcaf70dba28050a1ebb12c4e961919&sysparm_collection_key=user&sysparm_collection_label=Minimize+Left-bar&sysparm_collection_related_field=application_menu&sysparm_collection_related_file=sys_app_application&sysparm_collection_relationship=&sysparm_fixed_query=&sysparm_group_sort=&sysparm_list_css=&sysparm_m2m_ref=x_jarodm_libra_application_minimize&sysparm_query=&sysparm_referring_url=sys_user.do%3fsys_id%3d95bcaf70dba28050a1ebb12c4e961919%4099%40sysparm_record_rows%3d7%4099%40sysparm_record_target%3dsys_user%4099%40sysparm_record_list%3dactive%253Dtrue%255EORDERBYDESCsys_updated_on%4099%40sysparm_record_row%3d1&sysparm_stack=no&sysparm_target=&sysparm_view=

		var m2mConfigURL = 'sys_m2m_template.do?sys_is_list=true&sys_is_related_list=true&sys_target=x_jarodm_libra_application_minimize&sysparm_checked_items=&sysparm_collection=sys_user&sysparm_collectionID='+userID+'&sysparm_collection_key=user&sysparm_collection_label=Minimize+Left-bar&sysparm_collection_related_field=application_menu&sysparm_collection_related_file=sys_app_application&sysparm_collection_relationship=&sysparm_fixed_query=&sysparm_group_sort=&sysparm_list_css=&sysparm_m2m_ref=x_jarodm_libra_application_minimize&sysparm_query=&sysparm_referring_url=sys_user.do%3fsys_id%3d'+userID+'%4099%40sysparm_record_rows%3d7%4099%40sysparm_record_target%3dsys_user%4099%40sysparm_record_list%3dactive%253Dtrue%255EORDERBYDESCsys_updated_on%4099%40sysparm_record_row%3d1&sysparm_stack=no&sysparm_target=&sysparm_view=';

		return m2mConfigURL;

	},


	setPreference: function(prefName,value,userID){

		if(!userID){
			userID = gs.getUserID(); 
		}


		var pref = new GlideRecord('x_jarodm_libra_preference');
		pref.addQuery('preference',prefName);
		pref.addQuery('user',userID);
		pref.query();
		if(pref.next()){
			//update entry

			pref.setValue('enabled',value);
			pref.update();

			return true;

		}else{
			//create entry

			pref.initialize();
			pref.preference = prefName;
			pref.user = userID;
			pref.enabled = value;
			pref.insert();

			return true;

		}




	},

	getPreference: function (prefName,userID){

		if(!userID){
			userID = gs.getUserID(); 
		}

		var returnValue = false;

		var pref = new GlideRecord('x_jarodm_libra_preference');
		pref.addQuery('preference',prefName);
		pref.addQuery('user',userID);
		pref.query();
		if(pref.next()){

			returnValue = (pref.getValue('enabled') == '1');

			return returnValue;

		}else{

			return returnValue;

		}


	},


	processInstanceCustomizations: function(){

		//Age of instance

		var ageDescription = 'This instance has been online for this ';

		var instance = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
		instance.get('name','instance_name');
		var nowTime = new GlideDateTime();
		var updatedTime = new GlideDateTime(instance.sys_updated_on);      

		var age = this.getAge(updatedTime);

		this.insertIntoReport('Instance Age', ageDescription, 'Instance is this old', 'sys_properties', instance.getUniqueValue(),age,'Instance Age');


		//Age of each major version upgrade
		var versionCurrent = '';
		var versionCount = 0;
		var versionDescription = 'Upgraded to major version';

		var hist = new GlideRecord('sys_upgrade_history');
		hist.addEncodedQuery('from_version!=n/a^ORfrom_version=NULL');
		hist.orderBy('sys_created_on');
		hist.query();

		while(hist.next()){

			var histVersion = hist.to_version.split('-')[1];
			if(versionCurrent != histVersion){
				versionCount ++;
				versionCurrent = histVersion;

				var versionProper = versionCurrent;

				var histAge = this.getAge(new GlideDateTime(hist.upgrade_finished));

				switch (versionProper) {
					case 'newyork':
						versionProper = 'New York';
						break;
					case 'sandiego':
						versionProper = 'San Diego';
						break;

					default:
						//Just make it upper-case
						versionProper = versionProper.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + versionProper.slice(1);

				}

				var versionAgeOf = 'Upgrade to '+ versionProper + '('+versionCount+')';

				if(versionCount == 1){

					versionAgeOf = 'Initial install as '+ versionProper;

				}


				//gs.info('to:'+ versionCount + ' version:' + versionProper + ' age:'+histAge);

				this.insertIntoReport('Instance Age', versionDescription, versionAgeOf, 'sys_upgrade_history', hist.getUniqueValue(),histAge,'Instance Age');


			}else{

				//gs.info('skipping, already processed '+histVersion);

			}



		}



		//Active user accounts
		var userDescription = 'This active account may still be in use. Review and export or ignore as needed.';

		var users = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		users.addEncodedQuery('active=true^sys_class_name=sys_user^emailNOT LIKE@example.com^ORemail=');
		users.query();
		while(users.next()){

			var userDisplay = users.getDisplayValue() + ' ' + users.user_name + '/' + users.email;

			var lastLogin = this.getAge(new GlideDateTime(users.last_login_time));

			this.insertIntoReport('Active User', userDescription, userDisplay, 'sys_user', users.getUniqueValue(),lastLogin,'Last login');


		}

		//Committed update sets

		var closedUpdateDesc = 'In progress update set. Please review...';

		var closedUpdate = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
		closedUpdate.addEncodedQuery('state=complete');
		//openUpdate.addQuery('licensable',true);
		//openUpdate.addQuery('install_date','>=',updatedTime.getValue());
		closedUpdate.query();
		while(closedUpdate.next()){


			var installAge = this.getAge(new GlideDateTime(closedUpdate.install_date));
			var installNote = 'Committed';

			if(installAge == ''){
				installAge = this.getAge(new GlideDateTime(closedUpdate.completed_on));
				installNote = 'Closed out';
			}

			var usName = closedUpdate.name + ' (' + closedUpdate.application.name + ')';
			this.insertIntoReport('Update Set - Closed', closedUpdateDesc, usName, 'sys_update_set', closedUpdate.getUniqueValue(),installAge,installNote);

		}   

		//Open update sets
		var openUpDesc = 'In progress update set. Please review...';

		var openUpdate = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
		openUpdate.addEncodedQuery('state!=ignore^ORstate=NULL^state!=complete^ORstate=NULL^name!=Default^ORname=NULL');
		//openUpdate.addQuery('licensable',true);
		//openUpdate.addQuery('install_date','>=',updatedTime.getValue());
		openUpdate.query();
		while(openUpdate.next()){

			var installAge = this.getAge(new GlideDateTime(openUpdate.sys_created_on));
			var installNote = 'Created';

			var usName = openUpdate.name + ' (' + openUpdate.application.name + ')';
			this.insertIntoReport('Update Set - Open', openUpDesc, usName, 'sys_update_set', openUpdate.getUniqueValue(),installAge,installNote);

		}


		//Scoped Apps

		var scopeDesc = 'This scoped app is active on this instance. Please review...';

		var scope = new GlideRecord('sys_scope');
		scope.addQuery('sys_class_name','sys_app');
		//scope.addQuery('licensable',true);
		//scope.addQuery('install_date','>=',updatedTime.getValue());
		scope.query();
		while(scope.next()){

			var installAge = this.getAge(new GlideDateTime(scope.sys_updated_on));
			var scopeName = scope.name + ' (' + scope.scope + ')';
			this.insertIntoReport('Scoped App', scopeDesc, scopeName, 'sys_scope', scope.getUniqueValue(),installAge,'Installed or updated');

		}


		var defaultStoreApps = this.CONST_DEFAULT_STORE_APPS;

		//Store Apps
		var storeDesc = 'This scoped app is active on this instance. Please review...';

		var store = new GlideRecord('sys_store_app');
		//store.addQuery('sys_class_name','sys_store_app');
		//store.addQuery('licensable',true);
		//store.addQuery('install_date','>=',updatedTime.getValue());
		store.query();
		while(store.next()){

			var codeCheck = store.getValue('sys_code');

			if (defaultStoreApps.hasOwnProperty(codeCheck)){

				//gs.info('skipping '+codeCheck);

			}else{

				var installAge = this.getAge(new GlideDateTime(store.sys_updated_on));
				var storeName = store.name + ' (' + store.scope + ')';
				this.insertIntoReport('Store App', storeDesc, storeName, 'sys_scope', store.getUniqueValue(),installAge,'Installed or updated');

			}



		}


		//Plugins

		//global
		//updatedTime.addDays(2);

		//scoped
		var twoDays = 2 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000;
		updatedTime.add(twoDays);

		var pluginDesc = 'This plugin was activated after the instance was set up. ';

		var plugin = new GlideRecord('sys_plugins');
		plugin.addQuery('trackable',true);
		plugin.addQuery('licensable',true);
		plugin.addQuery('install_date','>=',updatedTime.getValue());
		plugin.query();
		while(plugin.next()){

			var installAge = this.getAge(new GlideDateTime(plugin.install_date));

			this.insertIntoReport('Plugin', pluginDesc, plugin.getDisplayValue(), 'sys_plugins', plugin.getUniqueValue(),installAge,'Installed');

		}


	},

	insertIntoReport: function(type,description,shortName,table,id,age,ageOf){

		var reportTable = 'x_jarodm_libra_instance_customization';
		var createdNewRecord = false;

		var pdiReport = new GlideRecord(reportTable);
		pdiReport.addQuery('reference',id);
		pdiReport.query();
		if(pdiReport.hasNext()){
			//gs.print('skipping '+users.getDisplayValue());
		}else{
			pdiReport.initialize();
			pdiReport.description = description;
			pdiReport.table = table;
			pdiReport.reference = id;
			pdiReport.name = shortName;
			pdiReport.type = type;
			if(age){ pdiReport.age.setDateNumericValue(age); }
			if(ageOf){ pdiReport.age_of = ageOf; }
			pdiReport.insert(); 

			createdNewRecord = true;
		}

		return createdNewRecord;

	},

	getAge: function(startingGDT){

		if(startingGDT == ''){

			return '';

		}

		var nowTime = new GlideDateTime();
		//gs.addInfoMessage('nowTime:'+nowTime.getDisplayValue());

		var difference = GlideDateTime.subtract(startingGDT,nowTime);

		//gs.addInfoMessage('difference:'+difference.getDisplayValue());

		var difference2 = difference.getNumericValue();

		//gs.addInfoMessage('difference2:'+difference2);

		return difference2;

	},

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_dc10f48edb27481019ced9595e961941
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.LibraGlobal</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>LibraGlobal</name><script><![CDATA[var LibraGlobal = Class.create();
LibraGlobal.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		
		
    },

	getSessionLastPage: function(){

		var urlOnStack = GlideSession.get().getStack().bottom();
		return urlOnStack;

	},
	
	flushMenuCache: function(){
		
		gs.cacheFlush("application_rest_menu_list");

		// tell the UI to refresh the navigator
		var notification = new UINotification('system_event');
		notification.setAttribute('event', 'refresh_nav');
		notification.send();
		
	},
    type: 'LibraGlobal'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>j4rodm</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-15 19:16:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>dc10f48edb27481019ced9595e961941</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LibraGlobal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Libra Toolkit Global" source="8c8e200edb27481019ced9595e96196e">8c8e200edb27481019ced9595e96196e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Libra Toolkit Global">8c8e200edb27481019ced9595e96196e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_dc10f48edb27481019ced9595e961941</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>j4rodm</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-18 22:08:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_2c9eec0edb27481019ced9595e9619be
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_app_application</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Libra Left-bar minimize</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {


	var raw = gs.action.getGlideURI().toString();
	var t = raw.indexOf("?");
	var l = raw.length();
	var z = raw.slice(0, t);

	if (z == 'sys_app_application.do' || z == 'sys_app_application_list.do') {
		//Modified query statement...
		// 		gs.addInfoMessage('special page detected:' + z);

	} else {
		//OOB query statement
		// 		gs.addInfoMessage('special page not found');
		// 		gs.addInfoMessage('bqbr ran');
		// 		gs.log('Will minimize','Pro PDI Left Bar Tool');

		//var userMinPref = gs.getUser().getPreference('libra_enable_minimize_left_nav');

		var lt = new x_jarodm_libra.LTooling();

		var userMinPref = lt.getPreference('left_bar_minimize');

		if(!userMinPref){

			// 			gs.info('will not minimize');
			//gs.addInfoMessage('will not minimize');

		}else{


			// 			gs.info('will remove clutter!');
			//gs.addInfoMessage('will remove clutter!');

			//Get user config
			var currentUserID = gs.getUserID();
			// 			var appIDs = []; 

			var safetyIDs = ['0f9c3255db27c41019ced9595e961928','148ee80edb27481019ced9595e9619b5']; 

			var hideApps = new GlideRecord('x_jarodm_libra_application_minimize');
			hideApps.addQuery('user',currentUserID);
			hideApps.addQuery('sys_id','!=',safetyIDs);
			hideApps.query();

			while(hideApps.next()){
				// 				appIDs.push(hideApps.application_menu.toString());
				var q = current.addQuery('sys_id','!=',hideApps.application_menu.toString());
			}


			//var q = current.addQuery('sys_id','!=',appIDs);
			//var currentQuery = current.getEncodedQuery();
			// 			gs.info('currentQuery:'+currentQuery);
			// 			gs.addInfoMessage('currentQuery'+currentQuery);

		}    

	}

	//gs.log('BR Ran:'+raw,'Pro PDI Left Bar Tool');


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>j4rodm</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-15 19:14:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2c9eec0edb27481019ced9595e9619be</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Libra Left-bar minimize</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Libra Toolkit Global" source="8c8e200edb27481019ced9595e96196e">8c8e200edb27481019ced9595e96196e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Libra Toolkit Global">8c8e200edb27481019ced9595e96196e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2c9eec0edb27481019ced9595e9619be</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>j4rodm</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-18 22:10:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2c9eec0edb27481019ced9595e9619be"/></record_update>
